metadata.title: CVE-2019-10897 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.0.0, the IEEE 802.11 dissector could go into an infiniteloop. This was addressed in epan/dissectors/packet-ieee80211.c by detectingcases in which the bit offset does not advance.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
